resume.title: Resume
resume.subtitle: Data & Impact Assessment Specialist
resume.summaryText: Data and impact assessment specialist with 8+ years in monitoring, evaluation, and data analysis for international sustainability and climate programmes. Expert in designing frameworks for impact measurement, results-based management, and evidence-based reporting. Experienced in multicultural, cross-regional environments supporting UN SDGs 8, 9, and 13.
